column1: Little Goat Diner////We started with the crisp shrimp cocktail.  So yummy.  The shrimp was large and flavorful.  Definitely would order that again!  My husband ordered the farmer's pie and me
column2: being the 11 year old that I am
column3: I ordered the fat club with a side of garlic mashed potatoes.  Best club sandwich of my life!!!!!!!  It's towering
column4: stocked with yummy meat and fresh veggies.  And the fat toast?!  Amazing!!  I loved the mashed potatoes too.  I ordered it without gravy
column5: but it came to our table with gravy on it.  Our waitress came by and asked if I wanted her to send it back but I said no
column6: that I liked it with the gravy actually.  My husband enjoyed his entree as well
